column6:
"Innocence Lost,",2005,2
Spinning out of "NYX," the true origin of X-23 continues - We've witnessed her creation and the acts of mental and physical manipulation that have made her the ultimate weapon. Now we will see her in action! Her first field mission - assassinate a U.S. presidential candidate surrounded by thousands of supporters in broad daylight. And that is just the beginning. Part 3 (of 6).
column8: | colorist:Brian Haberlin | writer:Craig Kyle | letterer:Cory Petit | inker:Jonathan Sibal | penciller (cover):Billy Tan
